about_the_game:
-- Welcome to Horror Storm --


Embark on a thrilling adventure and witness the chilling tale of two young campers lost in the mysterious forest.

-----------------------------
Synopsis:
-----------------------------
In the depths of the forest, two young campers become entwined in the unpredictable events of the world. One meets a mysterious end, leaving the other in shock and fear. The surviving camper, desperate for help, sets out for a nearby town. However, the town harbors a gruesome history in an underground hospital where terrifying mummies are crafted. As the camper navigates the town's winding streets, she will confront the horrifying secrets within the depths of the hospital and engage in an intense struggle for survival.



-----------------------------
Key Features:
-----------------------------
  • Immersive Story:
Get lost in a narrative filled with excitement, mystery, and unexpected events.
  • Creepy Atmosphere:
Explore the depths of the forest and the town's streets filled with dark secrets, accompanied by a tension-building soundtrack.
  • Survival Challenges:
Confront terrifying enemies to survive the night and unravel the secrets of the gruesome underground hospital.
  • Heart-Pounding Encounters:
With each step, uncover the truth behind the creation of the chilling mummies, leading to even more frightening revelations.
  • Stunning Graphics:
Experience the eerie world in vivid colors on your PC.

-----------------------------
Story:
-----------------------------
The story begins with a surgeon father who lost his wife in a fire that broke out in the town in 1986. One of his sons had his entire body burned, and the other was left with his face completely disfigured. The father goes insane after the event and contracts a deadly disease. His younger son, who is also a surgeon, establishes an underground hospital where he conducts brutal experiments on live people to create a cure for his father. The older son, meanwhile, hunts people around the town to find victims for his brother's gruesome experiments.
Two young campers, Dave and Amy, are camping near the forest close to the town. Dave is mysteriously killed, leaving Amy to seek help in the town, where she encounters the horrifying story.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB or Radeon R7 360, 2 GB or Intel Arc A310, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB or Intel Arc A580, 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
